title: N300 Want List with For Trade/Sale Link

posts.post_title: N300 Want List with For Trade/Sale Link
posts.post_content:
Looking for the following 2 N300's in lower grades:

Brouthers - Louisville
Russie - incorrect spelling 

My For Sale/Trade page is located at:
[url]www.imageevent.com/brailey/cardsforsale[/url]

Please contact me at [url]mikebrailey@yahoo.com[/url]

Thanks,
Mike

Mike,

Are you down to these three cards to complete the N300 set?  I know you've been going after that for a while.

Fred,

Yes, down to 3.  Not the highest graded set but a long road none the less.  Thanks for the encouragement.

Mike
